articles.title: Rupee rises on oil pullback; dollar liquidity remains inadequate - Reuters
articles.description: The Indian rupee rose marginally on Wednesday, helped by retreating oil prices and U.S Treasury yields, while the dollar/rupee cash swap rate indicated that dollar liquidity was less than sufficient.
